channel.title: Need YouTube Background WILL PAY RSGP
channel.description:
Alright, so I have started up a RuneScape channel for YouTube. And it's pretty plain at the moment, because I just created it! Lets get the the chase..
EDIT: FOR THE NEW YOUTUBE BACKGROUND.
So I am requesting a YouTube background for the channel.
If it is good enough I will pay for it with RSGP. I will put an amount out of how much im willing to pay for it.
What I want:
Professional looking text saying: "TommyLintsProductions", "Gameplay", and Commentaries", "Player vs. Monster", and "RuneScape", and the top
What Background I want: A background similar to Machinima. (doesnt have to be perfect)
What photos I want: http://i45.tinypic.com/sfaude.png http://i49.tinypic.com/2vrybly.png http://i45.tinypic.com/v4tfkn.png Please make those look professional.
PLEASE, add me on Skype so we can talk and get a limit on how much I want to pay: Username is: GrizzMe

item.title: Need YouTube Background WILL PAY RSGP
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

You cannot commission any work here.

Read full topic
